entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:33 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 4:25 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -40.5°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 39 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 39 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
